sentence.Network_en: Recent research progresses on high - speed countercurrent chromatography ( HSCCC ) were reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 综述近几年来高效 逆流色谱 ( HSCCC ) 的研究进展.

sentence.Network_en: Countercurrent washing is applied to reduce acid pollution effectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要采用逆流洗涤方式有效减轻酸污染.

sentence.Network_en: Countercurrent Chromatography is a newly - developed separation technology.
sentence.Network_cn: 逆流色谱技术是一种新颖的分离技术.

means.word_mean: 1. a stretch of turbulent water in a river or the sea caused by one current flowing into or across another current
2. actions counter to the main group activity;
